title: 2025 Lincoln Aviator Video Review
description: The Aviator, the mid-size three-row luxury SUV from Lincoln is as luxurious as ever with a fantastic styling update for 2025. The front end looks fantastic and freshly modern with grille and headlight upgrades.
author: Connie Peters, TTAC Creator
excerpt: The Aviator, the mid-size three-row luxury SUV from Lincoln is as luxurious as ever with a fantastic styling update for 2025.The front end looks fantastic and freshly modern with grille and headlight upgrades.

html:
Inside the new Lincoln Digital Experience means bigger screens and a Google-based system offering apps, voice commands via Google.

All Aviator specs now come with Lincoln Blue Cruise which is the brand's superb hands-free adaptive cruise control system but does require a subscription.

Here are all of my impressions after a recent test drive.
